snippet: WEINTRAUB--Selma JBI International, Inc. (Established in 1931 as The Jewish Braille Institute) deeply mourns the passing of longtime Trustee, Selma Weintraub. Together with her husband, Morris "Tiny" Weintraub, she was instrumental in supporting many of JBI's most important initiatives, which today help 35,000 blind and visually impaired children and adults around the world. Our thoughts are with the entire Weintraub family. May her memory serve as a blessing. Judy E. Tenney Co-Chairman of the Board Steven P. Polivy Co-Chairman of the Board Dr. Ellen Isler President & CEO Israel A. Taub Vice-President & CFO 1/3
lead_paragraph: WEINTRAUB--Selma JBI International, Inc. (Established in 1931 as The Jewish Braille Institute) deeply mourns the passing of longtime Trustee, Selma Weintraub. Together with her husband, Morris "Tiny" Weintraub, she was instrumental in supporting many of JBI's most important initiatives, which today help 35,000 blind and visually impaired children and adults around the world. Our thoughts are with the entire Weintraub family. May her memory serve as a blessing. Judy E. Tenney Co-Chairman of the Board Steven P. Polivy Co-Chairman of the Board Dr. Ellen Isler President & CEO Israel A. Taub Vice-President & CFO 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  WEINTRAUB, SELMA JBI INTERNATIONAL
